data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains a Newick-formatted Maximum Clade Credibility tree for the Neotropical cichlid tribe Geophagini. The tree has been pruned to include only those species used in the study and scaled to a total length of 1 to account for uncertainty in absolute ages. The file is readable in R Statistical Software and formatted for analyses with the R packages used in the study.
cichlid|adaptive landscape|adaptive peak|functional diversity|comparative methods|MCC tree
